name: Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Conformance Criteria - Ensure that Design is approved and Drawings are of the latest revision
Detail - Arrange for a survey of extents to be carried out
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - As per construction drawings.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection/Review

Conformance Criteria - Detailed and Delivered in accordance with drawings. Check delivery dockets when steel is delivered to site ensure that the correct materials have been delivered. On delivery to the site, steel reinforcement shall be stored on supports clear of the ground.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection/Review

Conformance Criteria - D & R reinforcing shall be grade 300 E bars, HD & HR Reinforcing shall be grade 500 E bars unless otherwise shown. Wire mesh shall be in accordance with AS/NZS 4671, to a minimum grade of 500 MPa.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Review
Conformance Criteria - Concrete mix & compessive strength
Detail - Confirm subgrade has adequate bearing capacity under foundtions
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Geotechnical Engineer Inspection & testing
Conformance Criteria - Geotechnical Engineer visual inspection of subgrade.
○ SPT to be undertaken on subgrade along footings. Test results shall be >150 kPa bearing capacity unless otherwise approved by the design engineer.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - The contractor is to confirm the material with Design Engineer
Conformance Criteria - 150 mm minimum of AP40 hardfill.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - NDM Testing
Conformance Criteria - Each layer of fill shall be uniformly compacted in layers not exceeding 225mm prior to compaction. Each layer shall be compacted to 95% MDD as determined by NZS 4402.
Detail - Site concrete placement under footings & floor slab
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Formwork installation on site for all structural concrete pours
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection

Conformance Criteria - Formwork installation shall be done in accordance with NZS3109:1997 Concrete Construction and the Project Specification. The grade of finish required will be constructed in accordance with project specification.
Detail - Fabrication and placement of Reinforcing Steel for reinforced concrete works
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection

Conformance Criteria - Reinforcing shall be bent and placed in accordance with NZS 3109, NZS 3101, NZS 4671 and the Project Specification. Reinforcement shall be adequately tied and supported to maintain correct position and cover.  Covers to reinforcement shall be as shown on structural drawings and as per NZS 3101.
Detail - Engineer to check the form work, waterproofing and steel before the concrete is poured.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Notice
Conformance Criteria - Engineer shall be given a minimum of 24 hours notice in advance for inspections
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Structural engineer inspection to confirm steel placement, construction joints, formwork, embedded items and surface finishes, in accordance with structural design.
Detail - Final record of works undertaken/completed
Frequency - During and at completion of work.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey / Drawings
Conformance Criteria - Any works outside Construction tolerance and signed off on OFI or similar. As Built by Surveyor. Red pen mark up drawings to be included in QA file
QA checked By Quality Manager: Kurt Beeton
Accepted By Design Engineer: Wanida Van Houtte
